Footfall & Vehicle Traffic

Number of people walking and driving by the location

Knowing the footfall and vehicle traffic is the key to estimating the number of people who could potentially be exposed to the brand and making revenue predictions
  • How many people walk by the potential location?
  • How many cars drive by it?
  • What is the distribution of traffic throughout the workday? Weekend? Week? Month?
London Snapshot
For: 12 Avery Row, W1K 4AW
  • Average footfall
  • Per day: 4355 people
  • Workday: 5477 people
  • Weekend: 2111 people
  • Average footfall
  • Per day: 4355 people
  • Workday: 5477 people
  • Weekend: 2111 people
Get report for your London location
Footfall traffic, Competitors, Demographic, and more...

Demographic Analysis

Age, gender, relationship status, household income, and more

Demographic data will help you make sure that there is a sufficient pool of potential customers around the target location. We bridge multiple sources of data and collate it all in one place enhancing the power of Location Intelligence
  • Who are the people living and working around that location?
  • Do they fit my target audience?
  • How many people are there within a 100 yards radius? 500? 1000?
London Snapshot
For: 12 Avery Row, W1K 4AW
  • Residents
  • Number of residents: 133 people
  • Largest age group: 30-44 years, 35%
  • Second largest: 45-59 people, 16%
  • Crime rating: High 10/10
  • Relationship status
  • Main: Single, 46%
  • Second: Married, 33%
  • Main religion: Christian, 51%
Get report for your London location
Footfall traffic, Competitors, Demographic, and more...

Amenities Analysis

Accessibility of the location and points of interest

Comprehending the amenities around your chosen location becomes pivotal in discerning the demographic that will frequent these establishments, guided by location analytics.
  • How accessible is the location?
  • What kind of supermarkets and groceries stores are nearby?
  • Are there any educational facilities nearby, such as nurseries, schools, or universities?
London Snapshot
For: 12 Avery Row, W1K 4AW
  • Total facilities around
  • Public transport stops: 17
  • Parkings: 55
  • Retail spots: 75

  • Education facilities: 23
  • Banks: 67
  • Post offices: 12
Get report for your London location
Footfall traffic, Competitors, Demographic, and more...

Competitor Analysis

Who are the competitors around and how they are performing

Competitive analysis will help paint a clear picture of the surroundings, understand what makes this location tick and identify hidden opportunities
  • What competition will I have to face?
  • What do their customers think about them?
  • Are the big brands there?
  • Are there enough competitors around to drive people to that location?
London Snapshot
For: 12 Avery Row, W1K 4AW
  • Competitors
  • Highest reviews number: 1097 - Hush Mayfair
  • Lowest: 0 - Kity Cow

  • Highest rating: 4.9 - The Salad Kitchen
  • Lowest: 0 - Kity Cow
